name: Mario Bros.
synopsis: Mario Bros. is a treasure trove of gaming history. The follow-up to the hit Donkey Kongâ„¢, it was not only the first time our hero was known as Mario, it also introduced his brother Luigi, green pipes, coins and even more now-familiar elements of the Mario series. The gameplay is simple yet challenging: eliminate all the enemies in each level for a big score.
